languages.text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

traits.locale_text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of tactical advantage equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} during their turn.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，装备者获得{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}“战术优势”{/g}层数，等同于本回合内{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人数量。
languages.original_text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，装备者获得“战术优势”层数，等同于本回合内{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人数量。

languages.text: В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж получает уровни эффекта {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактическое преимущество{/g}. Число уровней эффекта равно количеству противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от персонажа за его ход.
languages.original_text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

traits.locale_text: В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж получает уровни эффекта {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактическое преимущество{/g}. Число уровней эффекта равно количеству противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от персонажа за его ход.

В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж получает уровни эффекта "тактическое преимущество". Число уровней эффекта равно количеству противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} от персонажа за его ход.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、使用者はターン中に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した敵の数と同等の戦術的優位のスタックを獲得する。
languages.original_text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of tactical advantage equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、使用者はターンの間{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した敵の数と同等の戦術的優位のスタックを獲得する。

languages.text: Al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el portador obtiene acumulaciones de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g} equivalentes a la cantidad de enemigos que {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g} durante su turno.
languages.original_text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

traits.locale_text: Al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el portador obtiene acumulaciones de ventaja táctica equivalentes a la cantidad de enemigos que {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacte{/g} durante su turno.

languages.text: Am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhält der Träger {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Taktischer- Vorteil-Stapel{/g} in Höhe der Zahl der von ihm während seines Zuges {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Feinde.
languages.original_text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

traits.locale_text: Am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhält der Träger Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil entsprechend der Anzahl der von ihm während seines Zuges {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffenen{/g} Feinde.

languages.text: À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur acquiert un nombre de cumuls d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g} égal au nombre d'ennemis qu'il a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} au cours de son tour.
languages.original_text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

traits.locale_text: À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur acquiert un nombre de cumuls d'Avantage Tactique égal au nombre d'ennemis qu'il a {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchés{/g} pendant son tour.
À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur acquiert un nombre de cumuls d'Avantage Tactique égal au nombre d'ennemis qu'il a {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchés{/g} pendant son tour.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} sonunda aynı tur içinde {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} düşman sayısı kadar {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi kazanır.
languages.original_text: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.
